NEW YORK ( Reuters ) - Pfizer Inc ( PFE.N ) may have called its $ 118 billion bid for AstraZeneca Plc ( AZN.L ) a final offer , and its British rival sees no prospect of a deal being revived .
The deal is wounded , but perhaps not dead , said Mark Schoenebaum , an analyst with ISI Group in New York .
